html.main: <lux-form data-options='luxforms.trianglify_XGQZS'><script>if (!this.luxforms) {this.luxforms = {};} this.luxforms.trianglify_XGQZS = {"field": {"layout": "horizontal", "type": "form", "model": "trianglify", "id": "trianglify_XGQZS", "labelSpan": 6}, "children": [{"field": {"type": "fieldset"}, "children": [{"field": {"value": 150, "min_value": 1, "label": "cell size", "required": true, "type": "number", "max_value": 1000, "name": "cellsize"}}, {"field": {"value": 1, "min_value": 0, "label": "fill opacity", "required": true, "type": "number", "max_value": 1, "name": "fillOpacity"}}, {"field": {"value": 1, "min_value": 0, "label": "stroke opacity", "required": true, "type": "number", "max_value": 1, "name": "strokeOpacity"}}, {"field": {"value": 0, "min_value": 0, "label": "noise intensity", "required": true, "type": "number", "max_value": 1, "name": "noiseIntensity"}}, {"field": {"min_value": 0, "required": false, "label": "x gradient", "maxlength": 50, "type": "text", "max_value": 1, "name": "x_gradient"}}, {"field": {"min_value": 0, "required": false, "label": "y gradient", "maxlength": 50, "type": "text", "max_value": 1, "name": "y_gradient"}}]}, {"field": {"click": "luxforms.redraw", "disabled": "form.$invalid", "type": "button", "label": "redraw", "name": "redraw"}}]};</script></lux-form>
